titles: To the Right Honourable my Lord Marquess of Queensberry, Lord High Thesaurer of Scotland. Obsequies to the memorie, of that reverend, learned, and devoute prelate, Alexander, late Lord Bishop of Rosse. / Mr. Ninian Paterson.
publisher: Sold by Walter Pope in Roxburghs Closse ...,
notes: A funeral elegy in honour of Alexander Young, Bishop of Ross, who died in Paris in 1683.
Place of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
keywords: Young, Alexander, d. 1683 --  Death and burial --  Poetry.
Elegiac poetry, Scottish --  Early works to 1800.
